overview: The Undergrad is a sexy, gender-twisting parody of the 1967 classic "The Graduate." This playful celebration of both gender and sexual liberation investigates the choice of deviance, desire, and acceptance. The film follows Ben, who is lost at the brink of adulthood and mystified by his own growing desires as he finds himself in a new life of secrecy, submission, confusion, and confidence.
title: The Undergrad
